actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to authorize a demonstration program for the purpose of eliminating highway railroad grade crossings.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a demonstration project in Pine Bluff, Arkansas, for the purpose of eliminating highway railroad grade crossing accidents. Authorizes appropriations of up to $25,000,000 to pay the Federal share of such project. States that two-thirds of all funds expended under authority of this Act in any fiscal year shall be appropriated out the Highway Trust Fund.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23, United States Code, to authorize a demonstration program for the purpose of eliminating highway railroad grade crossings.
